content: I understand that it can be difficult to navigate the complexities of social media and the impact it has on our self-identity. it's important to remember that the images and messages we see on social media are often not an accurate representation of reality. it's okay to take a break or limit your time on social media if you find it is negatively affecting your self-esteem or self-image. it's also important to focus on your own achievements and the positive aspects of your life, rather than constantly comparing yourself to others. remember, your worth is not determined by your social media presence!
